lyrics: <span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>Quiero saber de ti, de todo lo que haces
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>Me has cambiado, soy otra persona
<span style = 'color:#ab2d35'>E quando a noite chega, não estou sozinho
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>어떻게든 넌 날 다시 살게 만들어 줘
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>나 지금 꿈꾸는 중인지 알고 싶어
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>네가 목표 향해 노력하는 걸 보며
<span style = 'color:#9541d5'>如漆黑梦境里倾泻而下的银河
<span style = 'color:#95c6d6'>哪怕彼此间记忆搁浅 时间停格
<span class = 'gradient-text'>在爱意感应中平行线终会重合
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>시간을 멈춰 우리 계속 이렇게 있자
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>Just looking at your eyes, feels like I finally get to have some rest
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>And every time I think of you, there’s fireworks up in my head
너, <span style = 'color:#f05e16'>diz que ficará tudo bem
<span style = 'color:#006400'>Para onde fores, é para lá que eu vou
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>어떻게든 넌 날 다시 살게 만들어 줘
<span style = 'color:#ffb7ce'>나 지금 꿈꾸는 중인지 알고 싶어
<span style = 'color:#ffb7ce'>네가 목표 향해 노력하는 걸 보며
<span style = 'color:#ffb347'>どんな　時でも　つながってる
<span style = 'color:#ffb347'>終わりが　来ても　幸せだよ
<span style = 'color:#ffb347'>同じ　星を　見つめたから
I’d do it all for you
어떻게든 넌 날 다시 살게 만들어 줘 (つらい時は)
나 지금 꿈꾸는 중인지 알고 싶어 (Kan ku rawat hatimu)
네가 목표 향해 노력하는 걸 보며 (不放开你的手)
네가 내 하루를 사랑으로 채워내 (Whenever things get hard)
모든 게 틀려도 난 여전히 행복해 (Lo vamos a lograr)
너와 같은 시간 속에 존재하니까 (Gagawin para sayo)
kr-lyrics: <span style = 'color:#f05e16'>어떻게든 넌 날 다시 살게 만들어 줘
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>나 지금 꿈꾸는 중인지 알고 싶어
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>네가 목표 향해 노력하는 걸 보며
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>시간을 멈춰 우리 계속 이렇게 있자
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>네 눈 속에서 난 쉼을 얻어
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>널 떠올릴 때마다 불꽃놀이처럼, 내 머릿속은 반짝여
Oh, oh-oh, <span style = 'color:#ab2d35'>이제야 난 알 것 같아
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>어떻게든 넌 날 다시 살게 만들어 줘
<span style = 'color:#ffb7ce'>나 지금 꿈꾸는 중인지 알고 싶어
<span style = 'color:#ffb7ce'>네가 목표 향해 노력하는 걸 보며
어떻게든 넌 날 다시 살게 만들어 줘 (힘들 때마다)
나 지금 꿈꾸는 중인지 알고 싶어 (네 마음 다쳐도 내가 고칠게)
네가 목표 향해 노력하는 걸 보며 (네 손을 놓지 않을 거야)
네가 내 하루를 사랑으로 채워내 (힘들 때마다)
모든 게 틀려도 난 여전히 행복해 (네 마음 다쳐도 내가 고칠게)
너와 같은 시간 속에 존재하니까 (너를 위해서라면 뭐든지 할게)
eng-lyrics: <span style = 'color:#9541d5'>I thought I would always be alone
<span style = 'color:#9541d5'>Without sharing my burdens
<span style = 'color:#9541d5'>But then you came, and everything changed
<span style = 'color:#9541d5'>I didn't know what happiness was
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>I want to know about you, everything you do
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>You changed me, I'm a better person
<span style = 'color:#ab2d35'>And when the night comes, I'm not alone
<span style = 'color:#ab2d35'>I have friends who comfort me
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>Somehow, you make me feel alive again
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>I wanna know if I'm dreaming now
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>Seeing you work hard toward your goals
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>Makes me want to shine more
<span style = 'color:#9541d5'>Like a galaxy pouring down from a pitch-black dream
<span style = 'color:#bfd95c6d6fea'>Even if memories drifts apart, time freezes
<span class = 'gradient-text'>In sensation of love, parallel lines will eventually meet
<span style = 'color:#006400'>I promise, you'll always be enough
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>Let's stop the time and stay like this
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>Just looking at your eyes, feels like I finally get to have some rest
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>And every time I think of you, there’s fireworks up in my head
Oh, oh-oh, <span style = 'color:#ab2d35'>I finally understood
You, <span style = 'color:#1c949a'>are always by my side
You, <span style = 'color:#f05e16'>say things will be alright
I, <span style = 'color:#c748aa'>will never change my mind
<span style = 'color:#006400'>Wherever you go, I'll be there
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>Somehow, you make me feel alive again
<span style = 'color:#ffb7ce'>I wanna know if I'm dreaming now
<span style = 'color:#ffb7ce'>Seeing you work hard toward your goals
<span style = 'color:#ffb7ce'>Makes me want to shine more
<span style = 'color:#ffb347'>No matter the time, we're connected
<span style = 'color:#ffb347'>Even when the end comes, I'm happy
<span style = 'color:#ffb347'>Because we gazed at the same star
<span style = 'color:#006400'>I promise, you'll always be enough
<span style = 'color:#1c949a'>Whenever things get hard
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>We'll make it happen
<span style = 'color:#95ac30'>I'd do it all for you
Whenever things get hard
I’ll mend your broken heart
I’d do it all for you
Somehow, you make me feel alive again (Whenever things get hard)
I wanna know if I'm dreaming now (I'll mend your broken heart)
Seeing you work hard toward your goals (I won't let go of your hand)
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>Makes me want to shine more
You fill my days full of love, (Whenever things get hard)
Even when things go wrong, I'm still happy (We'll make it happen)
Because I exists in same timeline as you (I'd do it all for you)
<span style = 'color:#006400'>I promise, you'll always be enough
jp-lyrics: <span style = 'color:#9541d5'>いつも一人だと思ってた
<span style = 'color:#9541d5'>誰にも寄りかかれないと
<span style = 'color:#9541d5'>でも君が来て　すべて変わった
<span style = 'color:#9541d5'>幸せが何かわからなかったのに
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>君のこと　すべて知りたい
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>私を変えてくれた　ずっと良くなった
<span style = 'color:#ab2d35'>夜が来ても私はひとりじゃない
<span style = 'color:#ab2d35'>慰めてくれる友達がいる
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>君は私を生き返らせるよ
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>私　夢を見てるのかな
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>君がゴールを目指す姿を見てると
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>もっと輝きたいと思うんだ
<span style = 'color:#9541d5'>漆黒の夢から降り注ぐ銀河のよう
<span style = 'color:#bfd95c6d6fea'>記憶が薄れるなら　時を凍らせて
<span class = 'gradient-text'>愛を感じて　平行線は最終的に出会うはず
<span style = 'color:#006400'>誓って言う　君はいつも充分やってるって
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>時を止めてこのままで
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>君の目を見るだけで, やっと少しの安らぎを得るようで
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>君のことを思い出すたびに, 頭の中で花火があがるようで
Oh, oh-oh, <span style = 'color:#ab2d35'>やっとわかった
You, <span style = 'color:#1c949a'>君はいつも私のそばにいる
You, <span style = 'color:#f05e16'>大丈夫だって言ってくれる
I, <span style = 'color:#c748aa'>私の心は決して変わらない
<span style = 'color:#006400'>君がどこへ行っても　私はそこにいる
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>君は私を生き返らせるよ
<span style = 'color:#ffb7ce'>私　夢を見てるのかな
<span style = 'color:#ffb7ce'>君がゴールを目指す姿を見てると
<span style = 'color:#ffb7ce'>もっと輝きたいと思うんだ
<span style = 'color:#ffb347'>どんな時でもつながってる
<span style = 'color:#ffb347'>終わりが来ても　幸せだよ
<span style = 'color:#ffb347'>同じ星を見つめたから
<span style = 'color:#006400'>誓って言う　君はいつも充分やってるって
<span style = 'color:#1c949a'>大変な時はいつでも
<span style = 'color:#a8a9ad'>やってみせるよ
<span style = 'color:#95ac30'>君のためなら何でも
大変な時はいつでも
傷ついた心 癒してあげる
君のためなら何でも
君は私を生き返らせるよ（つらい時は)
私　夢を見てるのかな（傷ついた心癒すよ）
君がゴールを目指す姿を見てると（君の手を離さない）
<span style = 'color:#f05e16'>もっと輝きたいと思うんだ
君は日々を愛で満たしてくれる（大変な時はいつでも）
うまくいかなくても 私は幸せ（やってみせるよ）
君と私 同じ世界線にいるんだから（君のためなら何でも）
<span style = 'color:#006400'>誓って言う　君はいつも充分やってるって
